system.effect: Prerequisites: Minor Gift - Motherly Compassion Daily/25 - Standard Action Target: Area Effect: You create a small Illusion, covering a cubic  area two meters on each side. The Illusion can emulate  visual and auditory senses only. Seeing through the  Illusion is a DC 15 Perception Check, with a +5 bonus  to the check if the Illusion is emulating something very  familiar to the observer. The Illusion may be sustained  for up to ten minutes as a Rapid Action each round.
